```{r}
 #Packages
 library(rtry)
 library(ggplot2)
 library(dplyr)
```

```{r}
 #Import Datasets
 load_path = './data/Try/'

 tryDat = rtry_import(
  paste0(load_path, '33400.txt'),
  separator = "\t",
  encoding = "Latin-1",
  quote = "",
  showOverview = TRUE
)
 summary(tryDat)
```


```{r}
#Filter out data of interest
tryDat_set = tryDat %>% 
    filter(TraitID == c(325, 21)) %>%
    filter(AccSpeciesID == c(32, 859, 41920))

summary(tryDat_set)
```


```{r}
#Save data for python analysis
write.csv(tryDat_set, file = paste0(load_path, "tryDat_subsetted.csv"))
```
